name: Renegade (itch) (Deja View)
description:
Renegade is an old-style space game based on asteroids where you fly around,
destroying the endless waves of evil ships, asteroids, and other debris. Each
wave spawns more enemies and at wave 10 the mothership is summoned
to defeat you.

At the same time collect upgrades from the wreckage to upgrade your ship
and survive as long as you can, using the scraps of enemy ships to heal
you, and collecting bombs from the wreckage of asteroids.

If you have any feedback do let me know here and feel free to post
your high scores down below. Have fun!

Controls:
WASD to move
Left click to shoot and right click to fire bombs
Hold space to slow down

Music:
Many thanks to https://tallbeard.itch.io/ for the loopable soundtrack
